name: The Abecean Monitor
text:
This note spawns different editions of the Abecean Monitor randomly and depending on the Journal stage of various quests.

Spawned Monitor entries last two days unless picked up. After two days, they delete themselves, and this spawner spawns a new copy. It also has a 20% chance to do nothing.

Place this note where you want Monitor entries to spawn in a cell - you can rotate it however you please - but do not place it into inventories.

If you're reading this in game, something is wrong.
